thread.title: Ora Recruits Meghan Trainor For 'X Factor' Judges Houses

author: newsr.in
title: Ora Recruits Meghan Trainor For 'X Factor' Judges Houses
text: Meghan Trainor wears a long sleeved top and her comfy slippers while running some errands in Los Angeles on Wednesday (October 7). The 21-year-old singer was just announced as Rita Ora ‘s guest during the Judges Houses on X Factor. PHOTOS: Check out the latest pics of Meghan Trainor Besides Meghan, Louis Tomlinson, Mark Ronson and [...] »
